winchester.name: 温彻斯特霰弹枪
winchester.english_notes: A basic shotgun that fires a spread of bullets.

thompson.name: 汤普森冲锋枪
thompson.english_notes: An automatic gun that fires rapidly.

awp.name: 狙击枪
awp.english_notes: Fires bullets that can pierce through one enemy.

ak47.name: AK-47
ak47.english_notes: An automatic gun that fires rapidly.

shades_revolver.name: 墨镜子弹的左轮手枪
shades_revolver.english_notes: A six-shot revolver that increases coolness.

vertebraek47.name: 脊椎K-47
vertebraek47.english_notes: Bullets close to each other will form links between each other, which hurts enemies on touch.

m1911.name: M1911
m1911.english_notes: A basic gun slightly stronger than most starter weapons.

void_marshal.name: 虚空元帅
void_marshal.english_notes: Fires fast-moving lasers. One of the guns wielded by the Beholster.

smileys_revolver.name: 笑脸左轮
smileys_revolver.english_notes:
Decreases shop prices while held.
Fire rate increased shortly after rolling.

magnum.name: 马格南手枪
magnum.english_notes: A six round revolver that does good damage.

trank_gun.name: M9
trank_gun.english_notes: A semi-automatic gun of moderate power that, despite it's name does not tranquilize.

machine_pistol.name: 机枪
machine_pistol.english_notes: A weak but high rate of fire gun.

makarov.name: 马卡洛夫枪
makarov.english_notes: A basic gun similar in power to starter weapons.

vulcan_cannon.name: 火神加农炮
vulcan_cannon.english_notes: A minigun with a very high rate of fire and large ammo capacity.

robots_right_hand.name: 机器人右手
robots_right_hand.english_notes: Starting gun of The Robot. Does not crack secret walls.

akey47.name: AKEY-47
akey47.english_notes: Opening a locked chest or door with the gun equipped opens it for free. Alternatively, shooting a locked chest or door unlocks it.

fortunes_favor.name: 财富的青睐
fortunes_favor.english_notes: While active, bullets will curve around the player.

cartographers_ring.name: 制图师的戒指
cartographers_ring.english_notes: New floors have a chance to be mapped out.

rube_adyne_mk2.name: 鲁布-亚达因型2号
rube_adyne_mk2.english_notes: Fires bouncing lasers with limited range.

winchester_rifle.name: 温切斯特步枪
winchester_rifle.english_notes: A weak rifle that fires one long range shot at a time.

gunslingers_ashes.name: 枪手骨灰
gunslingers_ashes.english_notes: Fires slow homing ghosts that shoot and deal contact damage.

infuriating_note_1.name: 令人气愤的纸条
infuriating_note_1.english_notes: Useless on its own. Has six variants, each of which reveals one of the directions necessary to make it through the maze in the Resourceful Rat's Lair.

infuriating_note_2.name: 令人气愤的纸条
infuriating_note_2.english_notes: Useless on its own. Has six variants, each of which reveals one of the directions necessary to make it through the maze in the Resourceful Rat's Lair.

infuriating_note_3.name: 令人气愤的纸条
infuriating_note_3.english_notes: Useless on its own. Has six variants, each of which reveals one of the directions necessary to make it through the maze in the Resourceful Rat's Lair.

infuriating_note_4.name: 令人气愤的纸条
infuriating_note_4.english_notes: Useless on its own. Has six variants, each of which reveals one of the directions necessary to make it through the maze in the Resourceful Rat's Lair.

infuriating_note_5.name: 令人气愤的纸条
infuriating_note_5.english_notes: Useless on its own. Has six variants, each of which reveals one of the directions necessary to make it through the maze in the Resourceful Rat's Lair.

infuriating_note_6.name: 令人气愤的纸条
infuriating_note_6.english_notes: Useless on its own. Has six variants, each of which reveals one of the directions necessary to make it through the maze in the Resourceful Rat's Lair.

old_knights_flask.name: 老骑士的酒壶
old_knights_flask.english_notes: Heals the player for one heart upon use. Gains 2 charges each floor.

alpha_bullets.name: A级子弹
alpha_bullets.english_notes: The first shot of a weapon's magazine will deal 80% more damage.

derringer.name: 大口径短口手枪
derringer.english_notes: A small, weak handgun with only two shots per magazine.

betrayers_shield.name: 背弃者护罩
betrayers_shield.english_notes: Upon reloading, leaves a protective shield on the ground. Players in that area will be protected until the shield has absorbed a number of bullets.

blank_companions_ring.name: 空响弹伙伴之戒
blank_companions_ring.english_notes: Activates a blank each time an active item is used.

jk47.name: JK-47
jk47.english_notes: Reloading inflicts fear on nearby enemies.

ac15.name: AC-15
ac15.english_notes: Becomes more powerful if the player has armor.

knights_gun.name: 骑士之枪
knights_gun.english_notes: Fires five bullets in an arrow shape. Gains some pickups when reloading an empty clip.

junkan.name: 垃圾
junkan.english_notes: Summons Ser Junkan, who follows the player, attacks enemies, and becomes stronger for each Junk picked up.

rubensteins_monster.name: Rubenstein's Monster
rubensteins_monster.english_notes: Created when both the RUBE-ADYNE Prototype and the RUBE-ADYNE MK.II are acquired. It rapidly fires pink lasers that can bounce once.

lichs_eye_bullets.name: 巫妖之眼子弹
lichs_eye_bullets.english_notes: Makes all guns act as if they have all their synergies.
